63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Had only ten Jews (amongst their chiefs) believed me, all the Jews would definitely have believed me

chapter.ara-name: باب إِتْيَانِ الْيَهُودِ النَّبِيَّ صلى الله عليه وسلم حِينَ قَدِمَ الْمَدِينَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The coming of the Jews to the Prophet (ﷺ) on his arrival at Al-Madina
